messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11. Room 2 is connected to room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 3 is connected to room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8. Room 4 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15. Room 5 is connected to room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 6 is connected to room 9, room 12, and room 15. Room 7 is connected to room 10, and room 13. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9 is connected to room 12 and room 15. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. What is the shortest path from room 1 to room 7? Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

You want to create a function to print out a message to the console: function answer (questions, answers, message) { // Create a variable named result  // Create a variable name index and check the input by using console.log to see what the value is. console.log (questions[index].input); if (questions[index].correct.split ("|")[0][0] === answers[index].split ("|")[0][0]) { console.log (messages[index].split ("|") [0]); // If the correct value is found. Otherwise, console.log (messages[index].split ("|") [1]); // If the correct value is not found. Then, let index = index + 1; } else if (questions[index].correct.split ("|")[0][0] === answers[index].split ("|")[1][0]) { console.log (messages[index].split ("|") [1]); } else if (questions[index].correct.split ("|")[0][0] === answers[index].split ("|")[2][0]) { console.log (messages[index].split ("|") [2]); } if (index === questions.length) console.log ("End!"); else return answer (questions, answers, message); } answer (questions, answers, "");
Bot Programming Language: You create a task and it will ask you a series of questions and return the correct answer with regular expression.
user: You are a programmer and you create a game called ‘Bots’. The game allows only one team participant. You want to allow for only 500 teams to play. You also want to create a program that checks if the participants exist within the game. You will be given a string of numbers and a value (0-20). Return true if the number of participants in your team has reached the given value. Otherwise, return false.
user: You can create a bot that will send messages to your game’s opponents (other teams). You want the bot to send messages to the opponents using regular expressions. But you only allow 500 messages/day. You want to create a robot that will ask a series of questions and return the correct answer.
user: You are in a computer room and you must write some code at the console by using 4 different prompts that will ask you different
